div.bibl: Svenska Tribunen, May 22, 1906. [CAMPAIGN FOR THE SAN FRANCISCO EARTHQUAKE VICTIMS]

body.p: William Westerlund, treasuerer of the Swedish National League (Chicago) reports $240.75 received to date for the relief of earthquake victims of San Francisco, California, among whom are five thousand Swedes. We feel that, in spite of the activities of Mayor Dunne's "Committee of Five Hundred," our Swedish friends here will think of the better showing made possible by our collection.
